WorkItem.Description: Yesterday morning this worked fine..later I installed Google Chrome..I could not get the program to open after that. I tried previous versions which worked. I uninstalled all versions reinstalled the .net framework and 2.2.5 still no joy. The earlier version will still work however.

Comments.Message: Which model were you last using. If it is Healadin this is a known issue.
Happened to me when I loaded up my healadin and exited.  Can't run it anymore.  Any way to work around it while we await a fix?

I'm a Lock...Ok I fixed it by doing the following ..I unhid my files and searched Rawr deleted everything... there was a lot of old vers too. Re-downloaded it and it's working so far. As a note and as an experienced computer user the user file did not contain the string you mentioned in your fix.
Ok back to looking at all the slick stuff I don't have yet. 
Thank you for the great program!

<Start - Search - All Files and Folders - Advanced Options - Search hidden files and folders ...Type in Rawr...Toss it all out.>
